content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols direct link to pattern pdf here 1 **materials ** * japanese size 2/0 crochet hook 2 0 mm * color a 100g 630 m * color b 50g 315 m the main body of the shawl is worked flat in row the decorative flower motifs are worked in the round **note ** pierrot reissued this same pattern in spring 2009 as 29-20 2 the patterns are identical 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/p6 pdf 2 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/461397/713923/904110/905035/
